column5: Does anyone know of any tackle shop in the GTA or in southern Ontario that carries the Fergie special lures ???  They are from patersons reel-bait in Nebraska but it looks like shipping prices are outrageous ?? Maybe I read it wrong but would like to know if they are here in Ontario to avoid crazy shipping.    Thanks

I think I ended up getting mine from cabelas. I had a bigish order and included some. I couldn't find them in Canada at the time, don't know about now.  The manufacture's website might have some listed?

Picked a Fergie up from Angling Sports in London, ON a few months ago.  I don't recall if they had a large selection or not.  I bought a Prototype Fergie, which is basically a Fergie Special with a fish pattern on it.  Angling Sports London Ltd. 681 Highbury Ave. N. London, ON N5W 4L4 519-649-7429
Pro Tackle in Belleville carries Fergie spoons,he also ships.
they're huge out west...wholesale sports carries them, can order online and no cross border shipping
Wow !!!! Thanks guys for the help I will try the shops you guys sent and check it out !!!!! Cheers & tight-lines !!!!!
Paddletales tackle in Winchester ontario ( not exactly the GTA) carries all sizes and colors. If you give him a call, he does ship out.
